Stinkbomb/Dark One/Scavenger/Nemesis Enforcer:

::Stinkbomb sat in a light blue chair in his room, the lights were off except 
one small lamp in front of him, the light shining brightly on what he was 
working on::
"Enemy, enemy, enemy, enemy..." (Stinkbomb said, only it sounded more like 
'emina' because of the paste he was speaking at)
::Adding a key component, the square object he was working on was done.  A 
homemade charge.  This was the fifth he had made, all in his quarters, his 
quarters which the doors were sealed from the inside so he wouldn't be 
disturbed::

=========

::Dark One stepped out of the brush, Pyro turning and aiming his weapon, 
lowering it slightly as he saw Dark One, then Scavenger::
"Who is in charge?" (Dark One asked the other Predacons there)

=========
<Zardus, this is Nemesis Enforcer.  I've assembled 8 cutting lasers (rifle 
form), two energy jackhammers, and a few spikes and sledgehammers>
::Nemesis informed Zardus, standing near the entrance of the base where 
everything was piled::
